location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing, for Bruce's information, copies of two letters from the Earl of Moira to Henry Willock, both dated 2 March 1816, discussing various recent events in Persia, including Willock's appointment as Charg√© d'affaires and the conduct of the Persian army in Bushire.
